evidence.source_document: Defendants' Opposition to Plaintiffs' Motion for Preliminary Injunction; Memorandum of Points and Authorities
evidence.text: Defendants again request that the Court make clear that any injunction enjoining implementation of the Workforce Executive Order and/or Workforce Memorandum does not deprive any enjoined components of their preexisting authority to conduct RIFs

evidence.source_document: Defendants' Opposition to Plaintiffs' Motion for Preliminary Injunction; Memorandum of Points and Authorities
evidence.text: any injunction should be considerably narrower than the TRO and significantly narrower than the preliminary injunction Plaintiffs have requested

extracted.value: Defendant: narrower injunction (preserve preexisting authority to conduct RIFs)
